TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DynamicObject extends System.Object implements class System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider

summary.span: 提供基底類別，以便指定在執行階段時的動態行為。

span.span: Provides a base class for specifying dynamic behavior at run time.

summary.span: 這個類別必須是繼承類別，您無法直接將其執行個體化。

span.span: This class must be inherited from; you cannot instantiate it directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DynamicObject`類別可讓您定義可以在動態物件上執行哪些作業，以及如何執行這些作業。The `DynamicObject` class enables you to define which operations can be performed on dynamic objects and how to perform those operations. 例如，您可以定義當您嘗試取得或設定物件屬性、 呼叫方法，或執行標準的數學運算，例如加法和乘法時，會發生什麼事。For example, you can define what happens when you try to get or set an object property, call a method, or perform standard mathematical operations such as addition and multiplication. 這個類別可以是很有用，如果您想要建立之程式庫更方便的通訊協定。This class can be useful if you want to create a more convenient protocol for a library. 例如，如果您的程式庫的使用者必須使用下列語法： `Scriptobj.SetProperty("Count", 1)`，您可以讓您能夠使用更簡單的語法，例如`scriptobj.Count = 1`。For example, if users of your library have to use syntax like `Scriptobj.SetProperty("Count", 1)`, you can provide the ability to use much simpler syntax, like `scriptobj.Count = 1`. 您無法直接建立的執行個體`DynamicObject`類別。You cannot directly create an instance of the `DynamicObject` class. 若要實作的動態行為，您可能想要繼承`DynamicObject`類別並覆寫所需的方法。To implement the dynamic behavior, you may want to inherit from the `DynamicObject` class and override necessary methods. 例如，如果您需要的設定和取得屬性的唯一作業，您可以覆寫只和方法。For example, if you need only operations for setting and getting properties, you can override just the and methods. 在 C# 中，來啟用從衍生類別的執行個體的動態行為`DynamicObject`類別，您必須使用`dynamic`關鍵字。In C#, to enable dynamic behavior for instances of classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class, you must use the `dynamic` keyword. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用動態類型](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md)。For more information, see [Using Type dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md). 在 Visual Basic 中的晚期繫結支援動態作業。In Visual Basic, dynamic operations are supported by late binding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 早期和晚期繫結](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724)。For more information, see [Early and Late Binding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724). 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立衍生自類別的執行個體`DynamicObject`類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of a class that is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. ```csharp public class SampleDynamicObject : DynamicObject {} //... dynamic sampleObject = new SampleDynamicObject (); ``` ```vb Public Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject '... Dim sampleObject As Object = New SampleDynamicObject() ``` 您也可以將您自己的成員加入衍生自類別`DynamicObject`類別。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的類別定義屬性，並且也會覆寫方法中，動態語言執行階段 (DLR) 會先使用語言繫結器來尋找靜態定義的類別中的屬性。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果沒有這類屬性，會呼叫 DLR方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. `DynamicObject`類別會實作 DLR 介面，這可讓您共用的執行個體`DynamicObject`支援 DLR 互通性模型的語言之間的類別。The `DynamicObject` class implements the DLR interface , which enables you to share instances of the `DynamicObject` class between languages that support the DLR interoperability model. 例如，您可以在其中建立的執行個體`DynamicObject`類別在 C# 中，並再將它傳遞給 IronPython 函式。For example, you can create an instance of the `DynamicObject` class in C# and then pass it to an IronPython function. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Dynamic Language Runtime 概觀](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md)。For more information, see [Dynamic Language Runtime Overview](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您有一個簡單的案例，您需要的物件，但是，只能新增和移除成員，在執行階段，不需要定義特定的作業，而且不會不有靜態成員，使用類別。If you have a simple scenario in which you need an object that can only add and remove members at run time but that does not need to define specific operations and does not have static members, use the class. > > 如果您有更進階的案例，您要定義參與互通性通訊協定，或您要管理快取的 DLR 快速動態分派動態物件的方式，建立您自己實作介面。If you have a more advanced scenario in which you need to define how dynamic objects participate in the interoperability protocol, or you need to manage DLR fast dynamic dispatch caching, create your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 假設您想要提供替代語法來存取值在字典中，也因此的書寫`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` Visual Basic 中)，您可以撰寫`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，您想要區分大小寫，此語法以便`sampleDictionary.Text`相當於`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, you want this syntax to be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicDictionary`類別，衍生自`DynamicObject`類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. `DynamicDictionary`類別包含的物件`Dictionary`型別 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來儲存索引鍵 / 值組，並覆寫和方法，以支援新的語法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它也提供`Count`包含屬性，其中顯示多少動態屬性字典。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.DynamicObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.dynamicobject/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.DynamicObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.dynamicobject/vb/module1.vb#1)] 如需其他範例，請參閱 < [ 建立包裝函式與 DynamicObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169008) C# 常見問題集部落格上。For more examples, see [Creating Wrappers with DynamicObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169008) on the C# Frequently Asked Questions blog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，以指定的二進位運算應該如何執行動態物件。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how binary operations should be performed for a dynamic object. 方法不覆寫時，執行階段繫結器的語言會決定行為。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (在大多數情況下，將會擲回特定語言的執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 當您有二元運算，例如加法或乘法，則會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when you have binary operations such as addition or multiplication. 例如，如果會覆寫方法，它陳述式之類的自動叫用`sum = first + second`或是`multiply = first*second`，其中`first`衍生自`DynamicObject`類別。For example, if the method is overridden, it is automatically invoked for statements like `sum = first + second` or `multiply = first*second`, where `first` is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 您可以使用，以取得二元作業類型的相關資訊`Operation`屬性`binder`參數。You can get information about the type of the binary operation by using the `Operation` property of the `binder` parameter. 如果您的動態物件只適用於 C# 和 Visual Basic`binder.Operation`屬性可以從下列值之一列舉型別。If your dynamic object is used only in C# and Visual Basic, the `binder.Operation` property can have one of the following values from the enumeration. 不過，如果您在 IronPython 或 IronRuby 等其他語言，您可以有其他值。However, in other languages such as IronPython or IronRuby, you can have other values. |值Value|描述Description|C#C#|Visual BasicVisual Basic| |-----------|-----------------|---------|------------------| |`Add`|不含溢位檢查，數值運算元的加法運算。An addition operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a + b`|`a + b`| |`AddAssign`|不含溢位檢查，數值運算元的加法複合指派運算。An addition compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a += b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`And`|位元`AND`作業。A bitwise `AND` operation.|`a & b`|`a And b`| |`AndAssign`|位元`AND`複合指派運算。A bitwise `AND` compound assignment operation.|`a &= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Divide`|算術除法運算。An arithmetic division operation.|`a / b`|`a / b`| |`DivideAssign`|算術除法複合指派運算。An arithmetic division compound assignment operation.|`a /= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`ExclusiveOr`|位元`XOR`作業。A bitwise `XOR` operation.|`a ^ b`|`a Xor b`| |`ExclusiveOrAssign`|位元`XOR`複合指派運算。A bitwise `XOR` compound assignment operation.|`a ^= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`GreaterThan`|「 大於 」 比較。A "greater than" comparison.|`a > b`|`a > b`| |`GreaterThanOrEqual`|「 大於或等於 」 比較。A "greater than or equal to" comparison.|`a >= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`LeftShift`|位元左移運算。A bitwise left-shift operation.|`a << b`|`a << b`| |`LeftShiftAssign`|位元左移複合指派運算。A bitwise left-shift compound assignment operation.|`a <<= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`LessThan`|「 小於 」 比較。A "less than" comparison.|`a < b`|`a < b`| |`LessThanOrEqual`|「 小於或等於 」 比較。A "less than or equal to" comparison.|`a <= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Modulo`|算術餘數運算。An arithmetic remainder operation.|`a % b`|`a Mod b`| |`ModuloAssign`|算術餘數複合指派運算。An arithmetic remainder compound assignment operation.|`a %= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Multiply`|不含溢位檢查，數值運算元的乘法運算。A multiplication operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a * b`|`a * b`| |`MultiplyAssign`|不含溢位檢查，數值運算元的乘法複合指派運算。A multiplication compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a *= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`NotEqual`|不是相等比較。An inequality comparison.|`a != b`|`a <> b`| |`Or`|位元或邏輯`OR`作業。A bitwise or logical `OR` operation.|`a | b`|`a Or b`| |`OrAssign`|位元或邏輯`OR`複合指派。A bitwise or logical `OR` compound assignment.|`a |= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Power`|引發到乘冪的數字的數學運算。A mathematical operation of raising a number to a power.|不支援。Not supported.|`a ^ b`| |`RightShift`|位元的向右移位作業。A bitwise right-shift operation.|`a >> b`|`a >> b`| |`RightShiftAssign`|位元右移複合指派運算。A bitwise right-shift compound assignment operation.|`a >>= b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Subtract`|不含溢位檢查，數值運算元的減法運算。A subtraction operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a - b`|`a - b`| |`SubtractAssign`|不含溢位檢查，數值運算元的減法複合指派運算。A subtraction compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a -= b`|不支援。Not supported.| > [!NOTE] > 若要實作`OrElse`(`a || b`) 和`AndAlso`(`a && b`) 在 C# 中的動態物件的作業，您可以同時實作方法和方法。To implement `OrElse` (`a || b`) and `AndAlso` (`a && b`) operations for dynamic objects in C#, you may want to implement both the method and the method. > > `OrElse`作業組成一元`IsTrue`作業和二元`Or`作業。The `OrElse` operation consists of the unary `IsTrue` operation and the binary `Or` operation. `Or`只有當使用者執行作業的結果`IsTrue`作業`false`。The `Or` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsTrue` operation is `false`. > > `AndAlso`作業組成一元`IsFalse`作業和二元`And`作業。The `AndAlso` operation consists of the unary `IsFalse` operation and the binary `And` operation. `And`只有當使用者執行作業的結果`IsFalse`作業`false`。The `And` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsFalse` operation is `false`. ## Examples 假設您需要的資料結構來儲存文字和數字表示的數字，而且您想要定義基本的數學運算，例如加法和減法，這類資料。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define basic mathematical operations such as addition and subtraction for such data. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicNumber`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 覆寫方法，以啟用數學運算。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable mathematical operations. 它也會覆寫和方法，以啟用存取項目。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to the elements. 在此範例中，支援唯一的加法和減法運算。In this example, only addition and subtraction operations are supported. 如果您嘗試寫入之類的陳述式`resultNumber = firstNumber*secondNumber`，執行階段例外狀況。If you try to write a statement like `resultNumber = firstNumber*secondNumber`, a run-time exception is thrown. (在大多數情況下，將會擲回特定語言的執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 在 C# 中，如果這個方法會覆寫時，它會自動叫用就是明確或隱含轉換，如下列程式碼範例所示。In C#, if this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an explicit or implicit conversion, as shown in the code example below. 在 Visual Basic 中，支援明確的轉換。In Visual Basic, only explicit conversion is supported. 如果您覆寫這個方法，它可以使用呼叫或函式。If you override this method, you call it by using the or functions. ```csharp // Explicit conversion. String sampleExplicit = (String)sampleObject; // Implicit conversion. String sampleImplicit = sampleObject; ``` ```vb // Explicit conversion - first variant. Dim testExplicit1 = CTypeDynamic(Of String)(sampleObject) // Explicit conversion - second variant. Dim testExplicit2 = CTypeDynamic(sampleObject, GetType(String)) ``` ## Examples 假設您需要的資料結構來儲存文字和數字表示的數字，而且您想要定義轉換此資料結構的字串與整數。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define conversions of this data structure to strings and integers. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicNumber`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 覆寫方法來啟用類型轉換。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable type conversion. 它也會覆寫和方法，以啟用存取資料的項目。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to the data elements. 在此範例中，支援只用於字串和整數的轉換。In this example, only conversion to strings and integers is supported. 如果您嘗試將物件轉換成任何其他類型，則會擲回執行階段例外狀況。If you try to convert an object to any other type, a run-time exception is thrown. (在大部分情況下，會擲回執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a run-time exception is thrown.) 當您有類似的陳述式時，會呼叫這個方法`Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty)`，其中`sampleObject`是衍生自類別的執行個體類別。This method is called when you have statements like `Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty)`, where `sampleObject` is an instance of the class derived from the class. 您也可以將您自己的成員加入衍生自類別`DynamicObject`類別。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的類別定義屬性，並且也會覆寫方法中，動態語言執行階段 (DLR) 會先使用語言繫結器來尋找靜態定義的類別中的屬性。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果沒有這類屬性，會呼叫 DLR方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. ## Examples 假設您想要提供替代語法來存取值在字典中，也因此的書寫`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` Visual Basic 中)，您可以撰寫`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，此語法必須區分大小寫，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`相當於`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, this syntax must be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicDictionary`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`類別包含的物件`Dictionary`型別 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來儲存索引鍵 / 值組，並覆寫和方法，以支援新的語法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它也提供`Count`包含屬性，其中顯示多少動態屬性字典。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. (在大部分情況下，會擲回執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a run-time exception is thrown.) 如果這個方法會覆寫時，它會自動叫用作業，例如當`sampleObject(100)`，其中`sampleObject`衍生自類別。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an operation like `sampleObject(100)`, where `sampleObject` is derived from the class. 在 C# 中，但在 Visual Basic 中不支援叫用物件的作業。The operation for invoking an object is supported in C# but not in Visual Basic. Visual Basic 編譯器永遠不會發出程式碼，請使用這個方法，而 Visual Basic 語言不支援下列語法： `sampleObject(100)`。The Visual Basic compiler never emits code to use this method, and the Visual Basic language does not support syntax like `sampleObject(100)`. ## Examples 假設您需要的資料結構，來儲存文字和數字表示的數字。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers. 您想要能夠個別指定每個屬性的值並能夠初始化的單一陳述式中的所有屬性。You want to be able to specify the value for each property individually and also to be able to initialize all properties in a single statement. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicNumber`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 覆寫方法，以啟用一次初始化的所有屬性。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable initialization of all properties at one time. 它也會覆寫和方法，以啟用個別的物件屬性的存取權。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to individual object properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，以指定應該如何叫用該物件成員的作業執行的動態物件。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that invoke an object member should be performed for a dynamic object. 方法不覆寫時，執行階段繫結器的語言會決定行為。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (在大多數情況下，將會擲回特定語言的執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 如果這個方法會覆寫時，它會自動叫用時執行的作業，例如`sampleObject.SampleMethod(100)`，其中`sampleObject`衍生自`DynamicObject`類別。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you perform an operation like `sampleObject.SampleMethod(100)`, where `sampleObject` is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 您也可以將您自己的方法加入類別衍生自類別。You can also add your own methods to classes that are derived from the class. 例如，如果您覆寫方法，動態分派系統首先會嘗試判斷指定的方法是否存在於類別。For example, if you override the method, the dynamic dispatch system first attempts to determine whether the specified method exists in the class. 如果找不到方法，它會使用實作。If it does not find the method, it uses the implementation. 此方法不支援`ref`和`out`參數。This method does not support `ref` and `out` parameters. 中的所有參數`args`陣列傳值方式傳遞。All parameters in the `args` array are passed by value. ## Examples 假設您想要提供替代語法來存取值在字典中，也因此的書寫`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` Visual Basic 中)，您可以撰寫`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，您會想要能夠呼叫此字典上的所有標準字典方法。Also, you want to be able to call all the standard dictionary methods on this dictionary. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicDictionary`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`類別包含的物件`Dictionary`型別 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` Visual Basic 中) 來儲存索引鍵 / 值組。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs. 它會覆寫方法，以支援的方法類別並覆寫和方法，以支援新的語法。It overrides the method to support methods of the class and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它也提供`Print`方法，它會列印出所有字典索引鍵和值。It also provides a `Print` method, which prints out all dictionary keys and values. (在大多數情況下，將會擲回特定語言的執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 如果這個方法會覆寫時，它會自動叫用作業，例如當`sampleObject[3] = 10`C# 中或`sampleObject(3) = 10`Visual Basic、 where`sampleObject`衍生自類別。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an operation like `sampleObject[3] = 10` in C# or `sampleObject(3) = 10` in Visual Basic, where `sampleObject` is derived from the class. ## Examples 假設您想要建立的物件的屬性可以存取由名稱這類`Property0`， `Property1`，依此類推，或索引，以便，例如`sampleObject.Property0`相當於`sampleObject[0]`在 C# 或`sampleObject(0)`Visual Basic 中。Assume that you want to create an object in which properties can be accessed either by names such as `Property0`, `Property1`, and so on, or by index, so that, for example, `sampleObject.Property0` is equivalent to `sampleObject[0]` in C# or `sampleObject(0)` in Visual Basic. 下列程式碼範例示範`SampleDynamicObject`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `SampleDynamicObject` class, which is derived from the class. `SampleDynamicObject`類別包含的物件`Dictionary`型別 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` Visual Basic 中) 來儲存索引鍵 / 值組。The `SampleDynamicObject` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs. `SampleDynamicObject` 覆寫和可依索引存取的方法。`SampleDynamicObject` overrides the and methods to enable access by index. 它會覆寫和方法，以啟用存取以屬性名稱。It overrides the and methods to enable access by property name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，以指定應該如何將值設定為成員的作業執行的動態物件。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that set a value to a member should be performed for a dynamic object. 方法不覆寫時，執行階段繫結器的語言會決定行為。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (在大多數情況下，將會擲回特定語言的執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 當您有類似的陳述式時，會呼叫這個方法`sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test"`，其中`sampleObject`是衍生自類別的執行個體類別。This method is called when you have statements like `sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test"`, where `sampleObject` is an instance of the class that is derived from the class. 您也可以將您自己的成員加入衍生自類別`DynamicObject`類別。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的類別定義屬性，並且也會覆寫方法中，動態語言執行階段 (DLR) 會先使用語言繫結器來尋找靜態定義的類別中的屬性。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果沒有這類屬性，會呼叫 DLR方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. ## Examples 假設您想要提供替代語法來存取值在字典中，也因此的書寫`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` Visual Basic 中)，您可以撰寫`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，此語法必須區分大小寫，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`相當於`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, this syntax must be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下列程式碼範例示範`DynamicDictionary`類別，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`類別包含的物件`Dictionary`型別 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來儲存索引鍵 / 值組，並覆寫和方法，以支援新的語法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它也提供`Count`包含屬性，其中顯示多少動態屬性字典。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫這個方法，以指定如何應該執行一元運算的動態物件。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how unary operations should be performed for a dynamic object. 方法不覆寫時，執行階段繫結器的語言會決定行為。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. (在大多數情況下，將會擲回特定語言的執行階段例外狀況)。(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 當您有一元運算，例如負號、 遞增或遞減，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when you have unary operations such as negation, increment, or decrement. 例如，如果會覆寫方法，這個方法會自動叫用陳述式之類`negativeNumber = -number`，其中`number`衍生自類別。For example, if the method is overridden, this method is automatically invoked for statements like `negativeNumber = -number`, where `number` is derived from the class. 您可以使用，以取得一元作業的類型的相關資訊`Operation`屬性`binder`參數。You can get information about the type of the unary operation by using the `Operation` property of the `binder` parameter. 如果您的動態物件只適用於 C# 和 Visual Basic`binder.Operation`屬性可以從下列值之一列舉型別。If your dynamic object is used only in C# and Visual Basic, the `binder.Operation` property can have one of the following values from the enumeration. 不過，如果您在 IronPython 或 IronRuby 等其他語言，您可以有其他值。However, in other languages such as IronPython or IronRuby, you can have other values. |值Value|描述Description|C#C#|Visual BasicVisual Basic| |-----------|-----------------|---------|------------------| |`Decrement`|一元遞減運算。A unary decrement operation.|`a--`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Increment`|一元遞增運算。A unary increment operation.|`a++`|不支援。Not supported.| |`Negate`|算術負運算。An arithmetic negation.|`-a`|`-a`| |`Not`|邏輯否定。A logical negation.|`!a`|`Not a`| |`OnesComplement`|的補數。A ones complement.|`~a`|不支援。Not supported.| |`IsFalse`|False 條件的值。A false condition value.|`a && b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`IsTrue`|則為 true 的條件值。A true condition value.|`a || b`|不支援。Not supported.| |`UnaryPlus`|一元加號。A unary plus.|`+a`|`+a`| > [!NOTE] > 若要實作`OrElse`(`a || b`) 和`AndAlso`(`a && b`) 在 C# 中的動態物件的作業，您可以同時實作方法和方法。To implement `OrElse` (`a || b`) and `AndAlso` (`a && b`) operations for
